definition: adenine nucleotide (A, pairs with thymine T 胸腺嘧啶 in DNA and with uracil U 尿嘧啶 in RNA)

pinyin: xian4 piao4 ling4 he2 gan1 san1 lin2 suan1

sentences.english: METHODS The deficiency of kidney-yang model of male mouse was induced by adenine.
sentences.chinese: 方法用腺嘌呤製備腎陽虛小鼠模型。

sentences.english: Natural cytokinins are all derivatives of adenine.
sentences.chinese: 天然的細胞分裂素是腺嘌呤的衍生物。

sentences.english: This is because each adenine tail lies flat on the substrate, taking up space.
sentences.chinese: 因爲每條腺嘌呤尾都“平躺”在片基上，加快了速度。

sentences.english: Adenine has a purine ring structure.
sentences.chinese: 腺嘌呤具有嘌呤環的結構。

sentences.english: Adenine refers to a portion of the molecule, the nitrogenous base.
sentences.chinese: 腺嘌呤指分子的一部分，即含氮鹼基。

sentences.english: Methods The kidney-yang deficiency rat model was induced by gastric infusion of adenine.
sentences.chinese: 方法用腺嘌呤製備腎陽虛大鼠模型。

definition: thymine nucleotide (T, pairs with adenine A 腺嘌呤 in DNA)
uracil nucleotide (U, pairs with adenine A 腺嘌呤 in RNA)
guanine nucleotide (G, pairs with cytosine C 胞嘧啶 in DNA and RNA)
cytosine nucleotide (C, pairs with guanine G 鳥嘌呤|鸟嘌呤 in DNA and RNA)
pentose (CH2O)5, monosaccharide with five carbon atoms, such as ribose 核糖[he2 tang2]
